name: ROD881
details: Real Overdrive/DistortionThe Maxon ROD881 Real Tube Overdrive/Distortion is an upgrade to the ROD880, offering more options for tonal shaping than its predecessor. Each pedal is powered by a hand-selected 12AX7WXT preamp tube, and overdrive is shapeable using Gain, Master, Bass, Middle, and Treble knobs. Up to +10dB of gain is available with the ROD881 and you can use the Mode switch to change between OD and Distortion.
